scripts.setup: bun install && ./scripts/dev/clone-opencode.sh && ./scripts/dev/clone-hive.sh && bun run config:generate && bun run tool:generate && bun run db:migrate
scripts.check:commit: bun run check:config && bun run check:tool-source && bun run check:staged && bun run check:secrets && bun run check:audit && biome check --no-errors-on-unmatched --files-ignore-unknown=true && bun run test:run && turbo check check-types --ui=stream --force && bun run build
scripts.check:config: bun run config:generate && bunx biome check --write hive.config.json hive.config.schema.json && git diff --exit-code hive.config.json hive.config.schema.json
scripts.check:audit: bun audit --audit-level high || echo '⚠️  Security audit found issues (see above)'
scripts.ruler:apply: cp README.md .ruler/prompts/README.md && cp docs/requirements/design.md .ruler/prompts/design.md && bunx @intellectronica/ruler@latest apply --local-only && biome check --write --no-errors-on-unmatched --files-ignore-unknown=true
scripts.build:installer: bun run tool:generate && bun run scripts/distribution/build.ts
scripts.typecheck: tsc --noEmit -p apps/server/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p apps/web/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p packages/cli/tsconfig.json
